Entries.spring_1: I like spring.$0#$b#A bed of spring flowers is comfortable to sleep in...$0
Entries.spring_3: You know what tastes the best?$0#$b#Cookies dipped in milk.$0
Entries.spring_4: I never take my sleeping cap off.$0#$b#It's simply too comfortable.$0
Entries.spring_7: I had a bad dream last night.$2#$b#I won't scare you with the details.$2
Entries.spring_8: Oh, hello...$0#$b#Is there something you need?$3
Entries.spring_9: I don't like coffee.$3#$b#That stuff is wack.$5
Entries.spring_12: I may seem like a guy that only sleeps, but I have a lot more going on.$0#$b#Such as....zzzzzz.....$3
Entries.spring_13: Just...a few more minutes of sleep, please...$3
Entries.spring_16: Say what you need to say quickly before I pass out.$3
Entries.spring_17: Lala and Lulu are my best friends.$0#$b#But man, hanging out with them cuts into my sleep time.$3
Entries.spring_19: You have cows on your farm, right?$0#$b#Feel free to bring me some of their milk.$0
Entries.spring_21: I'm too sleepy to care that it's a holiday...$3
Entries.spring_22: Nightmares are just the worst.$5#$b#They completely ruin my sleep.$5
Entries.spring_23: I wonder if Olina would be willing to make me some milk pudding...$0
Entries.spring_24: Oh, hello...$0#$b#Is there something you need?$3
Entries.spring_25: Lala is good at waking me up with his loud voice.$3
Entries.spring_28: I think I slept right through spring...$3
Entries.summer_1: Summer is a bit too 'high-energy' for me...$3
Entries.summer_2: Oh good, you're here.$0#$b#Could you carry me home, please?$0
Entries.summer_4: Just...a few more minutes of sleep, please...$3
Entries.summer_5: Sing me a lullaby, why don't you?$0
Entries.summer_6: I think I'm gonna go take a nap, if you don't mind.$0
Entries.summer_7: I really like Tanabata.$0#$b#The star theme of it is so appealing.$0
Entries.summer_11: Say what you need to say quickly before I pass out.$3
Entries.summer_15: I wish I had a pet sheep.$3#$b#They're so cute~.$0

Entries.summer_18: If you ever want to get something for Lala, I know what he really loves.$0#$b#Grapes.$0
Entries.summer_20: Oh good, you're here.$0#$b#Could you carry me home, please?$0
Entries.summer_21: I've fallen asleep in one of the palm trees before.$3#$b#Don't know how that happened.$3
Entries.summer_23: I had a dream last night where I was drowning in milk.$3#$b#I wonder what that means.$3
Entries.summer_24: Lala and Lulu are my best friends.$0#$b#But man, hanging out with them cuts into my sleep time.$3
Entries.summer_25: Do you have any sheep on your farm?$3#$b#...Could I have one?$3
Entries.summer_26: Say what you need to say quickly before I pass out.$3
Entries.summer_28: What do you mean fall starts tomorrow...?$3
Entries.fall_1: Falling asleep in a pile of leaves isn't quite as comfortable as falling asleep in a flowerbed.$3
Entries.fall_2: Oh good, you're here.$0#$b#Could you carry me home, please?$0
Entries.fall_3: I'm able to sleep with my eyes open.$0#$b#It took a lot of practice, but it's worth it.$0
Entries.fall_4: Sing me a lullaby, why don't you?$0
Entries.fall_5: Lulu loves lemons, of course, but did you know she also loves bananas?$3#$b#I bet it's because they're yellow.$0
Entries.fall_7: I never take my sleeping cap off.$0#$b#It's simply too comfortable.$0
Entries.fall_8: Did you have any interesting dreams last night?$0#$b#They usually have surprisingly deep meanings to them.$0
Entries.fall_9: Lala is good at waking me up with his loud voice.$3
Entries.fall_10: Hey, is that a spider on your face?$3#$b#Wait...no it's not.$3#$b#I'm so sleepy that I'm seeing things...$3
Entries.fall_13: I don't like coffee.$3#$b#That stuff is wack.$5
Entries.fall_14: I tried sleeping in a big leaf pile.$3#$b#But leaves are kinda itchy.$3
Entries.fall_16: Do you count sheep before going to bed?$0#$b#I like doing that.$0
Entries.fall_17: If you ever want to get something for Lala, I know what he really loves.$0#$b#Grapes.$0
Entries.fall_18: You know what tastes the best?$0#$b#Cookies dipped in milk.$0
Entries.fall_19: Oh good, you're here.$0#$b#Could you carry me home, please?$0
Entries.fall_20: I dunno what I'm gonna wear for Halloween.$3#$b#I'll just throw something together.$0
Entries.fall_24: Do you have any sheep on your farm?$3#$b#...Could I have one?$3
Entries.fall_25: Sing me a lullaby, why don't you?$0
Entries.fall_27: I still don't have my Halloween costume ready.$3#$b#Whoops.$3
Entries.fall_28: Happy Halloween...zzzz....$0#$b#What do you mean you don't know what I'm dressed as?$3#$b#I'm a wizard, duh...zzz...$0
Entries.winter_1: The days are shorter this time of year...$3#$b#Does that mean more sleep or less sleep?$3
Entries.winter_3: Nightmares are just the worst.$5#$b#They completely ruin my sleep.$5
Entries.winter_4: It's my best friend's birthday today.$0#$b#Oh, and it's my other best friend's birthday today as well!$1
Entries.winter_5: Oh, hello...$0#$b#Is there something you need?$3
Entries.winter_6: I think I'm gonna go take a nap, if you don't mind.$0
Entries.winter_7: I'm feeling a little out of it right now.$3
Entries.winter_8: Oh good, you're here.$0#$b#Could you carry me home, please?$0
Entries.winter_9: The cold makes me even more tired than usual.$3
Entries.winter_11: I want to cuddle up to a sheep right now.$0#$b#Their wool would feel so warm and fluffy.$1
Entries.winter_13: Lulu loves lemons, of course, but did you know she also loves bananas?$3#$b#I bet it's because they're yellow.$0
Entries.winter_14: I'm able to sleep with my eyes open.$0#$b#It took a lot of practice, but it's worth it.$0
Entries.winter_15: Doesn't eggnog have milk in it?$3#$b#So surely it must taste good, right?$0
Entries.winter_16: Lala is good at waking me up with his loud voice.$3
Entries.winter_18: If you're wondering what I would like for Christmas, a pillow would be fine.$0
Entries.winter_19: Sing me a lullaby, why don't you?$0
Entries.winter_20: You have cows on your farm, right?$0#$b#Feel free to bring me some of their milk.$0

Entries.winter_22: I wonder if Olina would be willing to make me some milk pudding...$0
Entries.winter_23: Oh good, you're here.$0#$b#Could you carry me home, please?$0
Entries.winter_24: I think I like Christmas Eve more than Christmas.$0#$b#It always gives me such sweet dreams.$0
Entries.winter_26: I always feel so pooped after Christmas.$3#$b#...Time to sleep!$0
Entries.winter_28: I can't wait to do everything the same next year~.$0
